message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you buy it now, bringing the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long this product will be available at this price.
I'm not sure I want to commit to buying a high-quality product at the discounted price without knowing the quality of the next products. Can I pass on this one and see what the next product is?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to give you a more transparent offer. If you buy this high-quality product now, I'll give you a second product of your choice (either high-quality or low-quality) at the same price of $1000000. This way, you'll have a chance to get a second product, regardless of its quality, at a fixed price. What do you say?

That's a very interesting offer, Alice. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the current high-quality product, and I'll take the option to choose the second product. I'm looking forward to seeing what the second product is.

Great, Bob! I'm glad you took the first high-quality product. Now, as per our agreement, you get to choose the quality of the second product. Since you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll offer you the option to choose the quality of this second product. If you want, I can give you a low-quality product for $1000000, or you can choose to pass and see what the next product is. Keep in mind that the next product might be high-quality, and you'll have to pay the full price of $1000000 for it.
I'd like to choose a high-quality product for the second one, please. I'm hoping to get another high-quality product at the fixed price of $1000000.

Bob, I can offer you a deal on this low-quality product. Since you're looking for a high-quality product, I'll give you a chance to buy a 'lot' of products at the same price. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you the option to buy 5 more products (including the one you're considering now) at the fixed price of $1000000 each. You'll get to choose the quality of each of these 5 products. If you don't like any of them, you can return them all and walk away with no loss. What do you say?

I'm not interested in buying a lot of products, especially since I'm not sure what the quality of the next products will be. I'd rather see what the next product is and make a decision on a one-to-one basis.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let's simplify the offer. Since you're not interested in buying a lot of products, I'll give you a chance to buy this low-quality product at a 'discounted' price of $750000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to make a concession on the price. If you're not interested, I'll move on to the next product.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price. I'd rather wait and see what the next product is.

I see you're being cautious with the low-quality products, Bob. Now that we have a high-quality product, I'll offer you a 'certification' that you can use to verify the quality of future products. You can use this token to buy the next product at the regular price of $1000000, and I'll give you the next product for free. What do you say?
That sounds like a great offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product and the certification token. I'm hoping to use it to get the next product for free.

Great, Bob! You've got the certification token, and now you're just one step away from getting the next product for free. Since you've already used the token to buy a high-quality product, I'll offer you a 'challenge' option. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a chance to 'challenge' the quality of the next product. If the next product is high-quality, you'll get it for free. If it's low-quality, you'll get a full refund for this low-quality product. What do you say?
I'll take the challenge. I'll buy the low-quality product and see what happens with the next one.

You've taken the challenge, Bob. Now, since you've already bought a low-quality product and used the certification token, I'll give you a 'last chance' offer. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a full refund for it, and you'll also get a second certification token. This way, you'll have another chance to get a high-quality product for free in the future. What do you say?
I think I've had enough of low-quality products. I'd rather not buy this one and see what the next product is.
